channel.title: Reseting problem
channel.description:
Sometimes people getting reseted on my server..?
how do i fix that

item.title: Reseting problem
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

[quote=“kihomura, post:2, topic:235987”][quote author=sabsabi link=topic=311286.msg2482861#msg2482861 date=1223655172]
Sometimes people getting reseted on my server…?

how do i fix that
[/quote]
i do but anyone has an idea like i have autorestarter every 20mins, how i can make it save at teh same time?

Sometimes when a player is logging off your run.bat will get an error, and if you close it while that happens, they get reset. So I’m guessing… try ‘::update 300’ of something like that, if you have it.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting problem
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“sabsabi, post:1, topic:235987”]Sometimes people getting reseted on my server…?

how do i fix that[/quote]

Sometimes when a player is logging off your run.bat will get an error, and if you close it while that happens, they get reset. So I’m guessing… try ‘::update 300’ of something like that, if you have it.

Read full topic
